name: Wigwam Ultimate Liner Pro Socks - Unisex
description: The deluxe blend of olefin, acrylic, nylon, and spandex provides excellent warmth and comfort next to the skin. By allowing some of the friction caused by walking to take place between the liner sock and the main sock, liner socks may also help reduce blistering.Made of a deluxe blend of 32% olefin (polypropylene), 33% acrylic, 20% nylon, and 15% spandex.Made for wearing under other socks, these liner socks add comfort and warmth.
